actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-210.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the printing of additional copies of the "Ethics Manual for Members and Employees of the U.S. House of Representatives".

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-210) Authorizes the printing as a House document of the "Ethics Manual for Members and Employees of the U.S. House of Representatives". Provides for the printing of 1,000 additional copies of such publication for the use of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the printing of additional copies of the "Ethics Manual for Members and Employees of the U.S. House of Representatives".
